name: Flying Snake
movement: walk 30 ft., fly 60 ft., swim 30 ft.
description: The Flying Snake is a brightly colored, winged serpent known for its agility in the air. It has long, flexible wings that allow it to glide effortlessly, making it a swift predator.
memorable: Its ability to avoid opportunity attacks while flying makes it a slippery opponent, especially when in groups.
goals: Typically hunts insects and small animals in jungles or tropical regions.
relations: Sometimes domesticated by tribespeople and cultists as messengers.
strengths: High Dexterity makes it nimble and quick, enabling effective ambush tactics from the air.
weaknesses: Low Strength and hit points make it fragile in direct confrontation.
attacks: Bite attack that deals piercing and poison damage, potentially causing up to 7 damage.
most_powerful_ability: Flyby allows it to maneuver without provoking opportunity attacks.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to sense its surroundings without sight.
skills: Has a decent passive perception of 11.
additional_information: It can glide effectively, making it hard to hit.
Often found in groups, they can be a nuisance.
Their venomous bite is more problematic in numbers.
Brightly colored appearance enhances its exotic nature.
Usually considered a minor threat to adventurers.
test_queries: brightly colored agile serpent in the jungle
winged snake that bites with poison
quick gliding snake that avoids attacks
